name: z-ring
effect: Allows the player’s Pokémon to use Z-moves.
short_effect: Allows the player’s Pokémon to use Z-moves.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A mysterious ring that enables Pokémon to use Z-Power. It requires both the willpower and the physical power of the Trainer wearing it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A mysterious ring that enables Pokémon to use Z-Power. It requires both the willpower and the physical power of the Trainer wearing it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A mysterious ring that enables Pokémon to use Z-Power. It requires both the willpower and the physical power of the Trainer wearing it.
